Enviar archivo PDF

<Heading
  id={"request"}

<ParamsDetails parameters={undefined}></ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}

    content: {

          type: "object",
          required: ["number", "pdfUrl"],

            number: { type: "string" },
            pdfUrl: { type: "string" },
            fileName: { type: "string" },
          },
        },
      },
    },
  }}
></RequestSchema>
